summary: A documentary that follows a billionaire couple as they begin construction on a mansion inspired by Versailles. During the next two years, their empire, fueled by the real estate bubble and cheap money, falters due to the economic crisis.
cast: Lorraine Barrett|June Downs|Phillip Froehlich|Marissa Gaspay|Jonquil|Tina Martinez|Virginia Nebab|Wendy Ponce|David Siegel|Jaqueline Siegel|Richard Siegel|Victoria Siegel|Katie Stam|Terry Vaughn|Cliff Wright|Alyse Zwick
title: La reina de Versalles
